data.text:
@stefanbar 

At what point will the Cases be set On Hold?

1. On allocation of the Case?
2. As soon as the Sorter is completed then a sproc can be called to mark it?

I recommend we do it immediately after the sorter runs without any front end functionality. This way the capturers will not receive the record at all or slow down the process.

The service will just need to call another sproc after the bulk importer is done.

@gillianoberholzer @lylenutt @willemhuman @neilbosworth
